name: Battle Every Step
description:
Help the members of the Haroldverse escape the Demon King's arena of endless battle!

Choose from the classic hero of legend, a martial arts student, and a good hero gone bad and fight your way out of this absurd arena.

Too much of a grind? Press the Shift key while in battle to turn turbo battle on or off.

Controls can be adjusted in the options menu.

Enter The Haroldverse jam theme used:

  • Enter The Haroldverse (Multiple versions of Harold are playable)

Sub theme:

  • HTML (the first letter of each boss’ name spells this)
  • Spark & Heal (2 of "legendary hero" Harold's default moves)
